name: Mecha Phantom Beast Aerosguin
effectText: Once per turn: You can banish 1 "Mecha Phantom Beast" monster from your Graveyard, except "Mecha Phantom Beast Aerosguin"; Special Summon 1 "Mecha Phantom Beast Token" (Machine-Type/WIND/Level 3/ATK 0/DEF 0). This card's Level is increased by the total Levels of all "Mecha Phantom Beast Tokens" you control. While you control a Token, this card cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects.
